pages.title: Coal Forges
pages.text: Not to be confused with $(l:mechanics/charcoal_forge)Charcoal Forges$(), Coal Forges are required for Heated Basin Recipes and Steam Power. They work in much the same way as a Blaze Burner in Create.$(br2)Coal Forges can be created by lighting a $(thing)Coal Block$() with a $(thing)Flint And Steel$(). Using a $(#f00)Firestarter$() will not work.

pages.title: Heating
pages.text: Coal Forges can be fuelled by $(thing)Deployers$() or $(thing)Mechanical Arms$() in order to produce $(l)$(#f80)Heat$()$().$(br2)They can be $(l)$(#f80)Heated$()$() by many different items such as Logs, Charcoal, Lignite, Coal Blocks and Dried Kelp Blocks.$(br2)In order to $(l)$(#3af)Superheat$()$() them however, they must be fed $(l:patchouli:create_integration/charcoal_upgrading#bituminous_coal)Bituminous Coal$().
The $(l)$(#f80)Heat$()$() level of a Coal Forge can be determined by its flame particle colour.
